name: Roll of the Dice (agegorin, damarrus)
description:
How to play:

- Choose the value on the die to match the value on the platform by pressing keys 1 to 6;
- Each platform has different effects (positive or negative);
- Matching on a positive platform, you get a positive effect;
- Matching on the negative platform, you are ignoring the bad effect;

Goal of the game:
- Score as many points as possible;
- Game over when you re-break a cube face, or break all the faces of your cube;
